Cards.Heading: how it works
Cards.body-1: Use your phone to take a clear, well lit photo of your product. Natural light near a window works best no fancy camera needed
Cards.body-2: Upload the photo straight to our site. No editing, no setup  just a simple upload, and you're good to go. our AI will handle the rest from here.
Cards.body-3: Shaheen generates a polished background with engaging captions , You can edit it before publishing, so you have full control over the final look

Faq.Heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.A-1: Just sign up for a new account, then upload a photo of your product. Our AI will handle the rest.
Faq.A-2: No, our platform is designed to be easy to use even if you have no prior experience.
Faq.Q-3: How can I edit the content ?
Faq.A-3: After the content is ready, you can edit it before publishing. You have full control.
Faq.Q-4: Can I use it on mobile ?
Faq.A-4: Yes, our platform is mobile-friendly. You can upload photos and edit content from anywhere.
Faq.A-5: Yes, we have a support team ready to help you anytime. You can contact us through the website or by email.
